posts.post_content:
I've got a duplicate T201 of Hooks Wiltse and Fred Merkle that I would like to trade for another T201 I need for my set.  I've attached scans of the front and back for your review.  As you can see, it's not a mint card but it's far from ugly.

[IMG]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm231/otismattsey/wiltsemerkleback.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm231/otismattsey/287e8b1a-2a89-4ab2-803f-23fcf1f3c333.jpg[/IMG]

Here are the cards I need for my set.  I'd prefer a lesser condition, but non-beater, examples such as I'm offering, but a beater of one of the few HOFers I still need would also work for me.

Abstein/Butler
Baker/Downie
Lapp/Barry
Bender/Oldring
Wheat/Bergen
Hartzell/Blair
Cicotte/Thoney
Gaspar/Clarke
Thomas/Coombs
Downs/Odwell
Doyle/Meyers
Seymour/Dygert
McBride/Elberfled
Leach/Gibson
Mattern/Graham
Grant/McLean
Lush/Hauser
Hickman/Hinchman
Summers/Jennings
Lake/Wallace
Walsh/Payne

Let me know if you have any of these and are interested in making a trade!

Regards,

Mike
